MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 and KA17 postcode areas of Strathaven and Darvel. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified and begun repairs on a grounded overhead line and we now expect your supply to be restored by 1:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:43am on Wednesday, 03 February 2021
